name: SnarfQuest Tales
description: You are Snarf, boldly and not so boldly going where no Snarf has gone before. You utilize your cunning and opportunistic nature to seek, fame, fortune, and adventure. After all, why fight a dragon when you can just trick it and get the gold?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.2Ghz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512mb Dedicated VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 654 MB available space
